data.Title: Google Launches June 2024 Spam Update
data.Description: Google has released a new spam update targeting websites that engage in spammy practices. The update is expected to impact search rankings and could take up to a week to fully roll out.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Are Changing Search Engine Optimization
data.Description: Google’s AI Overviews (AIOs) has disrupted eCommerce, forcing online retailers to rethink their search strategies. PYMNTS breaks it down.

data.Title: Google Search Indexing Issues Impact Major Websites
data.Description: Tweet from @rustybrick reporting a Google Search indexing issue affecting major websites.

data.Title: Google Maps Exploit Allows Manipulation of Business Listings
data.Description: Google Maps exploit lets you move your competitors map pin far away, resulting in their local rankings drops & even your business being suspended seroundtable.com/google-map-pin…

data.Title: Google Search Algorithm Leaked: An SEO Game-Changer?
data.Description: While Google has provided some insights on how its algorithm works in ranking web pages, most strategies we know are still based on studies and trials of marketers and SEO experts.

data.Title: Technical SEO Skills Can Lead to Higher Salaries
data.Description: Article highlighting an in-demand SEO skill set that can significantly increase salaries, focusing on technical SEO, website performance analysis, and analytics configuration.
